Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant that has enough water and sunlight, showing it healthy and growing.
The student can draw a plant that does not have enough water, showing how it looks dry or wilted.
The student can draw a plant that does not have sunlight, showing how it looks weak or faded.
The student can identify and show through drawing that plants need water to live and grow.
The student can identify and show through drawing that plants need sunlight to live and grow.
The student can use their drawings to show patterns about plantsâ€™ needs for water and sunlight.
